text: Bayer AG is a German pharmaceutical company. It is headquartered in Leverkusen, North Rhine-Westphalia. The company was founded in 1863 by Friedrich Bayer and are best known for being among the first to sell Aspirin for money. Category:1863 establishments in Europe Category:Healthcare companies of Germany Category:Leverkusen Category:1860s establishments in Germany Category:Pharmaceutical companies of Europe
title: Bayer
